Summary: This looked like a flying bright orange sphere and it moved fast
divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming back to the campsite from the tx ren fest around 7 pm. I noticed a bright orange light in the sky. It was traveling fast. I then pointed it out to 3 of my friends and they saw it too.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Todd Mission
There were no other sightings in Todd Mission on or around October 19th 2013
